snippet: But Apple’s slide of 4 percent brings down the Nasdaq.
abstract: Dow Jones industrial average rises as robust retail sales data helps large-cap consumer stocks, but Apple's slide of 4 percent brings down the Nasdaq.
lead_paragraph: But Apple’s slide of 4 percent brings down the Nasdaq.

headline.seo: Solid Retail Sales Lift Large Cap Shares
headline.main: Solid Retail Sales Lift Large-Cap Shares
headline.print_headline: Solid Retail Sales Lift Large-Cap Shares
